backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing user profiles, question management (with subjects and class levels), full syllabus mock tests with sections, test attempts with scoring, leaderboard functionality, and admin registration with access control using MixinAuthorization and MixinStorage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting four implemented features: useAdminRegistration hook, AdminRegistration page component, admin registration route, and admin setup navigation link, all with high confidence and mapped to test requirements REQ-128 through REQ-131.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including components (App, Layout, Navbar, Footer), pages (LandingPage, dashboards, TestInterface, ResultPage, Leaderboard, AdminRegistration), hooks (useQueries with dual admin verification, mutations), and styling files.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining light and dark theme variables for the Concept Delta navy blue theme, including sidebar, chart, and UI component colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with meta tags, SEO description for Concept Delta MHT-CET platform, and root div for React application mounting.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring React Query client, TanStack Router with route tree, theme provider for dark/light modes, and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying Concept Delta branding, quick links (Home, Dashboard, YouTube), social media handle, copyright notice, and caffeine.ai attribution with UTM tracking.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Root layout wrapper component providing consistent structure with Navbar at top, main content area with Outlet for nested routes, and Footer at bottom.
frontend/src/components/Navbar.tsx: Navigation bar with Concept Delta branding, responsive mobile menu, Internet Identity authentication, dual admin verification (useGetCallerUserRole and useIsCallerAdmin hooks), Admin Setup link for non-admin authenticated users, and extensive diagnostic logging for debugging role detection.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Manages the backend actor instance using React Query, creating authenticated or anonymous actors based on Internet Identity state and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
Provides a mutation hook for registering admin users by principal, validating input and displaying toast notifications for success, error, or already-registered states.
frontend/src/hooks/useChapterWiseTestMut: Exports mutation hooks for creating chapter-wise tests and assigning questions to them, invalidating related queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useFullSyllabusTestMu: Provides mutation hooks for creating full syllabus tests and assigning section-specific questions to them, with query invalidation on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context and provider, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validity with AuthClient integration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching full syllabus tests, chapter-wise tests, questions, user profiles, and user roles from the backend actor.
Provides a mutation hook for creating questions with admin authorization checks, detailed error logging, and toast notifications for success/failure.
frontend/src/hooks/useTestSectionMutatio: Exports mutation hooks for starting and submitting test sections with answers, invalidating test attempt queries on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes and responsive hero image styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminChapterWiseTestC: Admin page for creating chapter-wise tests with question selection, validation for test parameters (name, marks, duration), and automatic navigation after successful creation.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard with tabs for analytics, test management, question gallery, and user management; displays full syllabus and chapter-wise tests with role-based access control.
frontend/src/pages/AdminFullSyllabusTest: Admin page for creating full syllabus tests with two sections (Physics/Chemistry and Maths), allowing question selection per section with validation and success feedback.
frontend/src/pages/AdminQuestionCreate.t: Admin form for creating questions with text/image support, four options with images, correct answer selection, explanation, subject, and class level fields with validation.
frontend/src/pages/AdminRegistration.tsx: Admin registration page allowing the first admin to self-register and subsequent admins to be registered by existing admins, with principal ID input and clipboard copy functionality.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page component that displays hero banner, features, YouTube subscription prompt, and Telegram community link. Handles user authentication and navigation to dashboard or login based on Internet Identity status.
frontend/src/pages/Leaderboard.tsx: Displays top 10 test results in a leaderboard with medal icons for top 3 ranks, showing username, score, and time taken. Requires authentication and fetches leaderboard data for a specific test ID.
frontend/src/pages/ResultPage.tsx: Shows detailed test results including score, time taken, question-by-question breakdown, and subject-wise analysis. Supports PDF export of results for both full syllabus and chapter-wise tests.
frontend/src/pages/StudentDashboard.tsx: Main dashboard for students displaying available full syllabus and chapter-wise mock tests organized by class and subject. Handles test initiation and navigation to test interface with attempt tracking.
frontend/src/pages/TestInterface.tsx: Interactive test-taking interface with timer, question navigation, answer selection, and section management. Handles auto-submission on timeout and transitions between test sections.
frontend/src/routeTree.tsx: Defines application routing structure using TanStack Router with routes for landing, dashboards, admin pages, test interface, results, and leaderboard. All routes use a shared Layout component.
frontend/src/utils/pdfExport.ts: Generates PDF reports for test results, calculating scores, statistics (correct/incorrect/unanswered), and formatting HTML content with test details, performance indicators, and question-by-question breakdown for both full syllabus and chapter-wise tests.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting and managing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support for maintaining state like admin tokens across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color scheme using OKLCH color space (including sidebar, chart, and semantic colors), container settings, border radius variables, custom animations (accordion), and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state document for 'Concept Delta' MHT-CET mock test platform, tracking architectural decisions, known issues (including admin authorization bugs), existing features, and system design including Motoko backend, React frontend, Internet Identity auth, and two test types (full syllabus and chapter-wise).
